# 增加 TableDiff 组件

`unconfirmed`

### What problem does this feature solve?

2（甚至n？）个table数据的diff情况

### What does the proposed API look like?

类似 https://juejin.cn/post/7013260761711509534 ，<TableDiff dataGroup={[oldData, newData]} columns={columns} />
